```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(ggpubr)
library(CDM)
library(boot)
library(tidyverse)
library(dummy)
library(stringi)
library(stringr)


```


```{r}

rm(list = ls())

Q_pre <- read_csv("data/final_result_similar.csv")

glimpse(Q_pre)

```



```{r}

Q_pre

```


```{r}

learning_obj <- Q_pre %>% distinct(`Learning Objective`) %>% mutate(lo_id = row_number())
learning_obj

```


```{r}


Q <- Q_pre %>% inner_join(learning_obj) %>% select(Question, `Learning Objective`, lo_id) %>% mutate(temp = str_trim(str_replace_all(Question, "_|\\.", "")))
Q

```


```{r}

Q.distinct.id <- read_csv("data/Q_distinct_id.csv") 

Q.distinct.id <- Q.distinct.id %>% mutate(temp = str_trim(str_replace_all(value, "_|\\.", "")))
Q.distinct.id
```



```{r}

Q %>% inner_join(Q.distinct.id, by = "temp") 

```

```{r}

Q %>% anti_join(Q.distinct.id) %>% distinct(Question, temp) %>% select(-temp ) %>% write_csv("missing.csv")

```
